lines.text:
And that brings us to the end of
our tech demo!

Yep! Nothing else to look at!

Behind us right now is the boat
section.

Think of it like an overworld map.

In it, you can pilot your boat
around to make it to different
areas.

However, its far from finished
and to some extent, it's not
working properly.

There is no boundary currently
setup, and reverse doesn't work.

If you'd like to, you can still
pilot the boat around and see
things, but it will mostly be a
visual experience.

After you're done that, you can
pilot back to the dock and use
that to respawn in the previous
scene.

But please know *THIS* section is
still under construction and
Madeline acknowledges its
bugginess.

Anyways, thank you so much for
playing through and we hope you
like what you've experienced.

Once again, thank you so much
for everything this semester.

I was striving to get more
finished, but COVID burnout has
finally got to me; hope this
is still enough.
I'll see you in class next year!
